head.homeDescription: Compare over 50 car rental companies worldwide and get the best car rental deals at RentingCarz. Rent a car easily with the best price guarantee on economy, compact and minivans. Reserve in 3 simple steps!
head.pag3Description: Compare over 50 car rental companies worldwide and get the best car rental deals at RentingCarz. Rent a car easily with the best price guarantee on economy, compact and minivans. Reserve in 3 simple steps!
head.agentDescription: Our company specializes in car rentals for the U.S., Canada, Europe and Latin America. We work with industry leading companies. Easy, fast and secure

login.notmach: Confirm password it does not match with new password
login.SloganLogin: Access now over +50 Car Rental Companies inventory and more than 700,000 accomodations worldwide
login.ForAgentsWho: For agents who want the power solution behind the Agentcars platform and the simplicity to just login into our web based solution in order to quote and reserve your clients' car rental and accomodation needs anywhere in the world. With a simple login and password, the travel agent can access Agentcars platform and use the best travel solution with no setup required from the agent’s side.
login.ThisSolution: This solution is offered for small to medium sized agencies that want to offer live car rental solutions on their website. A Car Rental tab will allow users to input their search criteria and upon clicking search, the user will be seamlessly transferred to the search results, hosted in our site, where customers can complete the reservation. All look and feel from the i-Frame will reflect the corporate identity of the agency using it.
login.EnterTheEmail: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we’ll email you a link to reset your password.
login.EmailToReceive: Email to receive the bookings made.
login.NoCostAssociated: Cost: No Cost associated for the Agency. Time: Estimated set up is between 3-5 business days.
login.SimilarToTheIFrame: Similar to the I-Frame, this solution allows the agency to offer car rental in their own site. The Agency needs to set up a subdomain in their own page and redirect this page to our servers, where the solution will be hosted. All traffic and customer interaction in searching cars remains in the hosted agency’s web page and the look and feel of the solution will reflect the corporate identity of the agency using it. Agencies requesting a Subdomain must have a security certificate in their web site in order to encrypt payment information during a reservation.
login.stepsResetPassword: Please check your inbox. In the message you will find the steps to reset your password
login.errorForgotPassword: This email isn't valid, please try again using an email associated with your account
login.ForgotPasswordMessage: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we’ll email your a link to reset your password.
login.MadeForMediumAndLarge: This solution is made for medium and large companies that require a full integration of the platform in the internal sales platform of the company. This solution allows the company to customize everything around the platform, integrate car rental to other cross selling opportunities in the company's systems, and have full ownership of where and how to offer car rental services. This solution requires the company to have their IT department integrate our web services solution into their system. It's a mildly complex integration and all external IT costs associated with the implementation are the responsibility of the company. Agentcars does not charge for providing the documentation for the integration and will assist the company's IT team with technical questions, but Agentcars will not be responsible for the integration of the solution to the company's system.
login.EmailAddreValidateText: Please check your inbox, In the message you will find the steps to reset your password
login.ByClickingOnCreateAccount: By clicking on create account, you accept the terms and conditions and {link} of RentingCarz
login.EmailAddresNotValidateText: There is no user with this email address.
login.IReceiveOffersFromRentingCarz: I agree to receive offers and promotions from RentingCarz

reservation.Upto4: Up to 2 interest-free installments + Zero IOF.
reservation.AFIPtax: The price does not include the PAIS tax or the 4815/2020 AFIP's tax
reservation.Provides: Provides coverage for theft/fire/vandalism, windscreen, towing, tyre, headlight, key loss, roof, underbody damage etc (usually these are not covered by rental companies!)
reservation.promotext: Guarantees you a top brand at a discounted price. Brand is revealed once you complete your reservation.
reservation.CancelUpTo: Cancel up to the time of pickup.
reservation.Guarantees: Guarantees you a top brand at a discounted price. Brand is revealed once you complete your reservation.
reservation.rateOffers: rate offers great savings on important insurance products from our car rental providers.
reservation.avismessage: tablet with WiFi Hotspot For 5 Devices, Unlimited International Talk & Text, Audio/Video, Games, Google & Translate
reservation.includesCdw: Collision Protection with Deductible releases you of financial responsibility in case of damages to the car, provided the loss or damage was not the result of any prohibited use of the car.  Collision Protection with Deductible will not cover any deductible in case of an accident or damage to the car. In case of damage to the vehicle, the client will be responsible for any deductible that may apply
reservation.includesGPS: Includes a GPS navigation system available in multiple languages to make driving easier for you
reservation.includesLdw: Includes Liability Insurance which covers damage done to a third party.  Coverage amount differs by car rental company.  Please see car rental terms for specific coverage amount
reservation.yourCanFace: You can face unexpected costs during your trip because certain repair types and costs are not insured by the car hire company. RentalCover.com's Premium Roadside Assistance provides coverage for out of pocket expenses that you incur when things go wrong.
reservation.FreeRoadside: Free roadside assistance - all repair & "call out" costs are insured!
reservation.Refundable50: This rate is 50% refundable if cancelled up to 6 hours prior to pick-up time. There will be no refund if cancelled less than 6 hours prior to pick-up time.
reservation.Refundable75: This rate is 75% refundable if cancelled with at least 24 hours prior to pick-up time.
reservation.YouCanCancel: You can modify your reservation free of charge up to 48 hours before the pick-up time.
reservation.howWantToPay: How do you want to pay?
reservation.includesFuel: Includes a tank of gas which means you will receive the vehicle with a full tank of gas and return it empty to save you money and time
reservation.under25years: Most companies charge a fee for drivers under 25 years of age. Please contact us for more details.
reservation.Refundable100: This rate is 100% refundable if cancelled with a minimum of 48 hours prior to pick-up time.
reservation.SignInToEnjoy: Sign in to enjoy a faster booking process and manage your reservations
reservation.YesIWouldLike: Yes, I would like to purchase Premium Roadside Assistance for
reservation.includesTheft: Theft Protection releases you of financial responsibility in case of total or partial theft of the vehicle
reservation.nonRefundable: This rate is non-refundable if it is a no-show nor will there be any refunds if rental requirements are not met, such as not having a valid driver's license and credit card under the same name as the reservation.
reservation.popUpKayakpg3: Car rental companies require that your driver’s license be from your country of origin to qualify for these rates. Please indicate where your driver’s license is from:

Note: Keep in mind that some countries may have special requirements such as a passport or international driver's license.

HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationEndTime: The end time for the cancellation window is {date} at which time the booking will become fully non-refundable.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterNight: Cancellations made after {date} will result in a {nights} night(s) penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterAmount: Cancellations made after {date} will result in a {amount} USD fee.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationFailCheckIn: If you fail to check-in for this reservation, or if you cancel or change this reservation after check-in, you may incur penalty charges at the discretion of the property of up to 100% of the booking value.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterPercent: Cancellations made after {date} will result in a {percent} penalty of the stay charges and fees.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationNonRefundable: If you cancel your reservation, you will not get a refund or credit to use for a future stay.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterNightBetween: Cancellations between {dateStart} and {dateEnd} will result in a {nights} night(s) penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationBetweenNightsFree: Cancellation between {dateStart} and the day of check-in, {dateEnd}, is free of charge. No penalty charge will be incurred.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterAmountBetween: Cancellations between {dateStart} and {dateEnd} will result in a {amount} USD penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterNightOutsideOf: Nights outside of non-refundable date ranges will incur an additional {nights} night(s) penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterNightPartially: All cancellations from time of booking will incur a {nights} night(s) cancellation penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterPercentBetween: Cancellations between {dateStart} and {dateEnd} will result in a {percent} penalty of the stay charges and fees.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterAmountOutsideOf: Nights outside of non-refundable date ranges will incur an additional {amount} USD penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterAmountPartially: All cancellations from time of booking will incur a {amount} USD cancellation penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterPercentOutsideOf: Nights outside of non-refundable date ranges will incur an additional {percent} penalty of the stay charges and fees.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAfterPercentPartially: All cancellations from time of booking will incur a {percent} cancellation penalty charge.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAnyNightsNonRefundable: Any booked nights during non-refundable date ranges ({range}) are completely non-refundable from time of booking.
HotelsCancellationPolicies.CancellationAnyNightsNonRefundableAfterB: Any booked nights during the non-refundable date ranges ({range}) are completely non-refundable from time of booking.
